display_long_description:
Welcome to the marbles fantasy world of Marblecraft! Explore and try out every gameplay possibility related to marbles!

- In the mixed reality environment, build your own marble heaven right at home! There are over a hundred diverse building modules, tracks, mods, traps, and themed decorations! With simple and easy-to-learn operations and powerful editing functions, you'll have a smooth building experience.
[media]

- Build marble track & race! It's the F1 Marble Formula! Go on thrilling high-speed races. It supports live broadcasting and race-related features. There are all sorts of wonderful race track elements, as well as various mods and obstacles! Experience mind-blowing racing gameplay!
[media]

- Play marble music & watch them dance! Marbles transform into masters of the piano and various musical instruments! Your favorite music flows down with the marbles! The marbles dance gracefully to the music, swirling and twirling in the endless 3D space!
[media]

- Global players can create together, share your top-notch creativity, and enjoy a shared library of works for collaborative creation! Create, record, shoot, and share your marble videos from multiple angles to gain video views for your channels!
[media]
